name: EagleView Technologies
overview:
EagleViewÂ® Technologies invented the concept of 3D aerial roof measurements and provides precise, accurate roof measurement reports. Using aerial photographs, EagleView uses proprietary, patent-pending software to provide a report with a 3D model, color photographs, length and area measurement, roof pitch and more. These reports are the third-party independent standard, have been tested thousands of times and are accepted by the largest insurance carriers.

The service can be used anywhere or anytime using the EagleView apps for Androidâ„¢ and iPhoneÂ®. Contractors, insurance adjusters and insurance companies use EagleView reports for accurate estimates, ease of production planning, warranty documentation and to reduce conflicts and claim cycle times.
